channel.title: Help me guys.. i need 3 things

item.title: Help me guys.. i need 3 things
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

To connect an NPC to a shop… do this:

Search for:

wanneshop =

Until you see something like this.

else if (NPCID == ####) { //... PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##; //... }

Then add that under any of those, for the WanneShop = ## the #'s are the number of the shop you added to shops.cfg.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me guys.. i need 3 things

item.title: Help me guys.. i need 3 things
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

Look :

a npc isnt a case,if u want to make a working npc method u add it in

npc first click
npc second click
npc third click

something like :

if (npc == 1175) {

if u want an object to be clickd and then be activated u add it in

object click one
object click two
object click three

something like :

case OBJECT ID HERE:

Read full topic

item.description:
@getsome wrote:

“dude you are like THE best coder”

-Who is ?

A case is for an object/or a button

u add npc in the npc first click case

and objects in the object click one case

item.title: Help me guys.. i need 3 things
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

i am trying to add fishing… i added this case for the NPC ID (fishing spot) 1176

this is what i added {

Code:

case 1176: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("you get some raw food, use this on a range for cook xp!"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(1114); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(390, 15); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;i spawned the NPC for that case, but when you click on it, it doesnt do ANYTHING at all… please tell me what i am missing?

also i need another thing…

i made the SHOP and everything, but can you help me with how to connect the NPC to the SHOP i made?

and last but not least, when you have a client, it says something like example:

(java symbol) cloudclient - created by @@@@

how do i change what that says? and no im not editing another guys client, that was just a client i was using a while back that is stuck in my head.

Read full topic
